org.apache.ignite.streamer.index

Class StreamerIndexProviderAdapter<E,K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.streamer.index.StreamerIndexProviderAdapter<E,K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StreamerIndexProvider<E,K,V>, StreamerIndexProviderMBean
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StreamerHashIndexProvider, StreamerTreeIndexProvider

    public abstract class StreamerIndexProviderAdapter<E,K,V>
extends Object
implements StreamerIndexProvider<E,K,V>
    Convenient StreamerIndexProvider adapter implementing base configuration methods.

      • isUnique

        public boolean isUnique()
        Checks whether this index is unique or not. If it is, equal events are not allowed, which means that if a newly-added event is found to be equal to one of the already present events (Object.equals(Object) returns true), an exception is thrown.
        Specified by:
        isUnique in interface StreamerIndexProvider<E,K,V>
        Returns:
        True for unique index.

             boolean rollback,
             boolean rmv)
        Finalizes an update operation.
        Specified by:
        endUpdate in interface StreamerIndexProvider<E,K,V>
        Parameters:
        sync - Index update synchronizer.
        evt - Updated event.
        rollback - Rollback flag. If true, a rollback was made.
        rmv - Remove flag. If true, the event was removed from index.
